title: Baby turtles put through their paces on tiny treadmill
text:
Baby turtles put through their paces on tiny treadmill 2:53pm GMT - 01:04 
Newly-hatched turtles have extraordinary stamina, scientists from Florida Atlantic University have found, allowing them to spend hours crawling across the beach as they search for the ocean. Amy Pollock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Newly-hatched turtles have extraordinary stamina, scientists from Florida Atlantic University have found, allowing them to spend hours crawling across the beach as they search for the ocean.
